Text: come on man,what bull is this introduction of yours here,don't tell me because of that sicko in Norway who mentioned the word "crusade" in his vomit manifest,you successfully opened up the Knight Templar front on TPB.it is 21st century for smoke sake,and religion is for weak and desolated mind no matter where they come from.

Nice collection of interesting books. Thanks.
But to link these secret societies to that disturbed idiot in Norway is nothing but utter BS. 
But then again, you know that already, don't you?
Now that quote about the templars (from InfiniteIndefinite) definitely sounds not bad.
